titles.title: A bill to designate the United States Post Office building to be constructed in Greer, South Carolina, as the "Edd A. Burch Post Office Building".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Federal Services, Post Office.

committee.subcommittee: Federal Services, Post Office, and Civil Service
committee.name: Senate Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 2/5/1987--Introduced. Designates the United States Post Office building to be constructed on Pennsylvania Avenue in Greer, South Carolina, as the Edd A. Burch Post Office Building.
